languages.text: {n}Голос Муарана становится задумчив.{/n} "Сон Лилэтан беспокоен. Он оградил от вас часть себя — то, что мон-кай зовут "изолированный регион". Сначала я решил, что ваше холодное железо измучило его плоть, и он пытается оздоровиться, отвергнув вас, но... Я вижу нечто иное в происходящем. Нечто загадочное".

{n}Muaran's voice grows pensive.{/n} "The Lilaethan's slumber is restless. She has guarded a part of herself away from you — it is what the mon-keigh call the isolated region. At first, I thought it was the Lilaethan's attempt to push you away, so she could heal from the wounds your cold iron had inflicted upon her flesh, but... I see something else in what is transpiring. A mystery."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Муарана становится задумчив.{/n} "Сон Лилэтан беспокоен. Он оградил от вас часть себя — то, что мон-кай зовут "изолированный регион". Сначала я решил, что ваше холодное железо измучило его плоть, и он пытается оздоровиться, отвергнув вас, но... Я вижу нечто иное в происходящем. Нечто загадочное".

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran's voice grows pensive.{/n} "The Lilaethan's slumber is restless. She has secluded a part of herself away from you — it is what the mon-keigh call the isolated region. At first I thought it was her attempt to push you away so she could heal from the wounds your cold metals had inflicted upon her flesh, but... I see something else in what is transpiring. A mystery."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}穆兰的声音变得沉思起来。{/n}“莉莱赞的沉睡躁动不安。她在远离你们的领土，圈出了一片只属于她自己的一部分，也就是你们猴子所说的‘隔离区’。我一开始以为，这个世界打算将你们推到一旁，好让你们的寒铁造成的创口慢慢愈合。然而……我却看到了其他的景象，这真是令人费解。”
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's voice grows pensive.{/n} "The Lilaethan's slumber is restless. She has guarded a part of herself away from you — it is what the mon-keigh call the isolated region. At first, I thought it was the Lilaethan's attempt to push you away, so she could heal from the wounds your cold iron had inflicted upon her flesh, but... I see something else in what is transpiring. A mystery."

traits.locale_text: {n}穆兰的声音变得沉思起来。{/n}“莉莱赞的沉睡躁动不安。它在远离你们的地方，圈出了一片只属于它自己的一部分，也就是你们猴子所说的‘隔离区’。我一开始以为，这个世界打算将你推到旁边，好让你们的寒铁造成的创口慢慢愈合。然而……我却看到了其他的景象，这真是个谜团。”
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}ムアランの声は物思いに唸った。{/n}「リラエタンの停滞は落ち着かない状態だ。あなたには一部の土地を遠ざけている…モン＝ケイが『隔離地域』と呼ぶ地域のことだ。最初は、冷たい鉄がその肉に与えた傷を癒す為、リラエタンがあなたを遠ざけているのかと思っていた。だが…現在起こっている事には別の目的がある。正に謎だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's voice grows pensive.{/n} "The Lilaethan's slumber is restless. She has guarded a part of herself away from you — it is what the mon-keigh call the isolated region. At first, I thought it was the Lilaethan's attempt to push you away, so she could heal from the wounds your cold iron had inflicted upon her flesh, but... I see something else in what is transpiring. A mystery."

traits.locale_text: {n}ムアランの声は物思いに唸った。{/n}「リラエタンの停滞は落ち着かない状態だ。あなたには一部の土地を遠ざけている…モン＝ケイが『隔離地域』と呼ぶ地域のことだ。最初は、冷たい鉄がその肉に与えた傷を癒す為、リラエタンがあなたを遠ざけているのかと思っていた。だが…現在起こっている事には別の目的がある。正に謎だ」
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}Muaran se queda pensativo.{/n} «El sueño del Lilaethan es inquieto. Hay una parte de sí que ha sellado, es lo que los mon-keigh llamáis la región aislada. Al principio pensaba que era un intento del Lilaethan de alejaros para curarse de las heridas infligidas por vuestro frío acero, pero... veo algo más en lo que sucede. Un misterio».
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's voice grows pensive.{/n} "The Lilaethan's slumber is restless. She has guarded a part of herself away from you — it is what the mon-keigh call the isolated region. At first, I thought it was the Lilaethan's attempt to push you away, so she could heal from the wounds your cold iron had inflicted upon her flesh, but... I see something else in what is transpiring. A mystery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran se queda pensativo.{/n} «El sueño del Lilaethan es inquieto. Hay una parte de sí que ha sellado, es lo que los mon-keigh llamáis la región aislada. Al principio pensaba que era un intento de alejaros para curarse de las heridas infligidas por vuestro frío acero, pero... veo algo más en lo que sucede. Un misterio».
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}Muarans Stimme wird nachdenklich.{/n} "Der Schlaf der Lileath ist rastlos. Sie hat einen Teil von sich selbst vor Euch beschützt. Die Chem-Pan-Sey nennen ihn die isolierte Region. Zuerst dachte ich, es sei der Versuch der Lileath, Euch wegzustoßen, damit die Wunden heilen können, die Euer kalter Stahl ihrem Fleisch zugefügt hat, doch ... Ich sehe noch etwas anderes in den Geschehnissen. Ein Mysterium."
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's voice grows pensive.{/n} "The Lilaethan's slumber is restless. She has guarded a part of herself away from you — it is what the mon-keigh call the isolated region. At first, I thought it was the Lilaethan's attempt to push you away, so she could heal from the wounds your cold iron had inflicted upon her flesh, but... I see something else in what is transpiring. A mystery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muarans Stimme wird nachdenklich.{/n} "Der Schlaf der Lileath ist rastlos. Sie hat einen Teil von sich selbst vor Euch beschützt. Die Chem-Pan-Sey nennen ihn die isolierte Region. Zuerst dachte ich, es sei ihr Versuch, Euch wegzustoßen, damit die Wunden heilen können, die Euer kalter Stahl ihrem Fleisch zugefügt hat, doch ... Ich sehe noch etwas anderes in den Geschehnissen. Ein Mysterium."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}La voix de Muaran se fait plus pensive.{/n} « La lilaethan dort d'un sommeil agité. Elle a fait en sorte de conserver une partie d'elle hors d'atteinte, que les mon-keigh appellent la région isolée. J'ai d'abord cru que c'était pour vous repousser le temps de soigner les blessures infligées par votre fer, mais... je vois maintenant qu'il s'agit d'autre chose, même si cela reste un mystère pour le moment. »
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's voice grows pensive.{/n} "The Lilaethan's slumber is restless. She has guarded a part of herself away from you — it is what the mon-keigh call the isolated region. At first, I thought it was the Lilaethan's attempt to push you away, so she could heal from the wounds your cold iron had inflicted upon her flesh, but... I see something else in what is transpiring. A mystery."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Muaran se fait plus pensive.{/n} « La lilaethan dort d'un sommeil agité. Elle a fait en sorte de conserver une partie d'elle hors d'atteinte, que les mon-keigh appellent la région isolée. J'ai d'abord cru que c'était pour vous repousser le temps de soigner les blessures infligées par votre fer, mais... je vois maintenant qu'il s'agit d'autre chose, même si cela reste un mystère pour le moment. »
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran

languages.text: {n}Muaran'ın sesi durgun çıkıyor.{/n} "Lilaethan'ın uykusu huzursuz. Kendisinden bir parçayı, mon-keighlerin izole bölge dediği şeyi sizden sakınıyor. Başta Lilaethan sizi kovmak istiyor, açtığınız yaraları iyileştirmeye çalışıyor sandım ama şimdi görüyorum ki başka şeyler oluyor. Gizemli şeyler."
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran's voice grows pensive.{/n} "The Lilaethan's slumber is restless. She has guarded a part of herself away from you — it is what the mon-keigh call the isolated region. At first, I thought it was the Lilaethan's attempt to push you away, so she could heal from the wounds your cold iron had inflicted upon her flesh, but... I see something else in what is transpiring. A mystery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran'ın durgun bir hâli var.{/n} "Lilaethan'ın uykusu huzursuz. Kendisinden bir parçayı sizden sakınıyor... Mon-keigh'lerin izole bölge dediği şey. Başta Lilaethan sizi kovmak istiyor, açtığınız yaraları iyileştirmeye çalışıyor sandım ama şimdi görüyorum ki başka şeyler oluyor. Gizemli şeyler."
traits.speaker: JungleWorldEldarSeer_Muaran
